attributes.action: Honour Carlos Martinez for his efforts in promoting Gay integration in East London
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Over recent years no man, except perhaps Graham Norton or Dale Winton has done more to further the integration of gays into society. Certainly neither of these men could have done more in the East London area where Carlos has settled and found work. Let us all rejoice in the shining light that he is to all and honour him.

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
